Contributing
============

All the contributions are welcome! Please open [an
issue](https://github.com/theskumar/python-dotenv/issues/new) or send us
a pull request.

Executing the tests:

    $ pip install -r requirements.txt
    $ pip install -e .
    $ flake8
    $ pytest

or with [tox](https://pypi.org/project/tox/) installed:

    $ tox
